mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expenditure (user_id, category_id, asset_id, amount, description, expenditure_date, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{assetId}, #{amount}, #{description}, #{expenditureDate}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT expenditure_id, user_id, category_id, asset_id, amount, description, expenditure_date, created_at, updated_at FROM expenditure WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY expenditure_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE expenditure SET category_id = #{categoryId}, asset_id = #{assetId}, amount = #{amount}, description = #{description}, expenditure_date = #{expenditureDate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE expenditure_id = #{expenditureId}
